string.text: Toggle Blueprint Hud Preview Animation Style
Toggle Blueprint Hud Preview Animation Duration

A non-standard diesel generator, with parts sourced from the wreck of a small fishing vessel in the murky swamp beds of the zaton valley, old warehouses surrounding the jupiter factory and truck cemetary. This generator has been touched with some stalker magic and has been retrofitted for 'household use'.
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] � %c[ui_gray_1] Mechanical Item
 %c[d_orange] � %c[ui_gray_1] Placeable Item
 %c[d_purple] � %c[ui_gray_1] Capable of outputting up to 5KW 
 %c[d_purple] � %c[ui_gray_1] Requires Diesel, Kerosene or Biodiesel to operate
 %c[d_purple] � %c[ui_gray_1] Full Tank Lasts 9 hours
 %c[d_purple] � %c[ui_gray_1] Turbine Power Unit
%s needs connecting to a power source
%s doesn't have enough watts to power %s
%s is greater than %s and doesnt need repairing
%s has a higher condition than it's replacment
This device is protected by a ceramic fuse
A 3-8A (Ampere) fuse, handcrafted from parts reclaimed from old machinery found in factories, protecting applicances under 450w (watts)
A Broken Fuse, likely tripped during a power surge in which the device it was attached to was protected was receving that current
Slightly Wet Pack of Ceramic Fuses
A Wet Pack of Ceramic Fuses

Mangun's Machinery branded fuses. Containing 10x 3-13A (Ampere) fuses, typically holding 10 fuses per pack but due to being scavanged from old factories around rostok, the overall quality is hard to cipher.

Mangun's Machinery branded fuses. Containing 10x 3-13A (Ampere) fuses, typically holding 10 fuses per pack but due to being scavanged from old factories around rostok, the overall quality is hard to cipher.

Mangun's Machinery branded fuses. Containing 10x 3-13A (Ampere) fuses, typically holding 10 fuses per pack but due to being scavanged from old factories around rostok, the overall quality is hard to cipher.
A small box of homemade fuses, containing about 10.

%c[white] Steel plated tank with plastic cover and rubber seal and cap.

%c[white] Electrical Turbine works in synchronous action with the engine.

500ml of diesel, suitable for refuelling a generator
500ml of diesel, suitable for refuelling a generator
500ml of methanol, used to craft diesel, also used in the creation of methanol-diesel combination which can cool generator engines
500ml of scrap diesel, a mixture of mostly carbon matter and some recycled diesel from oil products
